Roupen Khanjian

            Roupen Khanjian
          
          
            
              Hi there! I am a graduate student in Statistics, with an emphasis in Data Science at the University of California, Santa Barbara. When I’m not doing data analysis (mainly in R), I spend way too much time playing sudoku, settlers of catan, or watching basketball.
